name: Zoo Quest
description:
Zoo Quest is a single-player riddle/puzzle game.

You accidentally let the monkeys escape from their cage and it's your duty to find them and bring them back to where they're safe!

Explore the zoo and talk to other animals, they will give you clues in exchange for favors!

The game consists mostly of rhyming riddles so put your riddle solving skills to the test and find the 3 lost monkeys to win the game!
